alert.note: Alert for Merced - Madera - Mendota (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 4:14PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Merced County through 445 PM PDT... At 414 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Livingston, or 10 miles west of Atwater, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Merced, Atwater, Livingston, Delhi, Winton, Hilmar-Irwin and Ballico. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
